description: The Government of Canada spent an estimated $7.6K
  in 2021-2022 on contracts with MEDTRONIC CANADA. The average
  contract duration was 0.86 year, and the average contract
  value (not including contracts under $10k) was $2.7M.
  The longest contract was 1.73 year. The largest contract
  by value (including amendments) was $18.8M.
most_recent_fiscal_year_total: '7.6K'

s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor: '7'
s431_number_of_contracts_by_vendor_with_amendments: '1'
s431_number_of_contracts_amendments_percentage: '14%'
s432_mean_amendment_increase_percentage_by_vendor: '334%'
s434_mean_number_of_amendments_by_vendor: '2'
